This class is the control class for all of the user input via the keyboard

public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
This method handles the keypressed events (namely the arrow keys and the space bar). Also known as the motion and fireing

Specified by:
keyPressed in interface KeyListener
Overrides:
keyPressed in class KeyAdapter

keyTyped

public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e)
This method handles key types. This is the pause, quit, speed up, slow down save and stop saving key buttons that can be pressed.

You can press p to pause/play the game. q to quit the game. w to increase the speed. s to decrease the speed. r to save/stop saving images

Specified by:
keyTyped in interface KeyListener
Overrides:
keyTyped in class KeyAdapter
